member.name: M:helloserve.com.Shedding.Api.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.summary: Manage the user account

member.name: M:helloserve.com.Shedding.Api.Controllers.UserController.Put(System.String,helloserve.com.Shedding.Api.Models.UserDetail)
member.summary: Register a user.
member.param: A unique string that identifies the user or the device.
An object detailing specific user criteria, like the notification period.
member.remarks: No header is required to be passed with this method. This method only needs to be called once.
member.returns: 204 - No Content, 206 - Partial Content : Data not supplied, 409 - Conflict : user identification string already exists

member.summary: Update the user's details.
member.param: A data object containing the new values to use.
member.returns: 204 - No Content, 206 - Partial Content : Data not supplied

member.summary: The area id.

member.summary: The stage id. Either what is currently in effect, or for the value requested.

member.name: P:helloserve.com.Shedding.Api.Models.ScheduleDetail.IsCurrentlyShedding
member.summary: If the area is currently being load shedded. This value is relative to the requested stage, meaning it will be false for stage 3 if the area is currently being shedded on stage 2.

member.name: P:helloserve.com.Shedding.Api.Models.ScheduleDetail.CurrentShedding
member.summary: Will be populated of IsCurrentlyShedding is true. Contains details relating to the current ongoing load shedding only.

member.name: P:helloserve.com.Shedding.Api.Models.ScheduleDetail.FutureShedding
member.summary: A ascending list of future scheduled shedding on the selected(or currently in effect) stage.

member.summary: The area id being shedded.

member.summary: The start date and time (UTC) of the shedding.
